attributes.additional_details:
As part of the election Cameron promised that MPs who did not meet the requirements of their local area, the local people of the area could rally together and have their local MP sacked from their position and replaced.

Some of the local MPs are not supporting the local people and do not have contact with local people on a regular basis ie a open day where local people can meet their MP at a meeting to bring to attention any issues in the local area. This may help to stop the riots that occurred over the past week.

The only time MPs are seen is at elections or when its come to the attention of the media and they have to be seen to be listening to the community.
